item.title: About
item.description: Why 887? It’s a prime number and has 3 letters. That’s it. No deeper meaning behind it. I can type it on my keyboard hitting the keys really fast. That’s why. Hi, i’m a software dev. Most of the software that i ended up writing over the decades has been for my employer or personal projects. So you can’t find my projects here on github. That’s ‘what happened’. I do use and support open source.

item.title: Red Rising
item.description: I read this and all following books in the series and highly recommend it. The philosophy in the original first three books inspired me deeply. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Rising

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Introduction So, i avoided blogging for ages and instead messaged people on various platforms or wrote to myself in files or a personal discord. So i’m starting a blog in 2023? Yes, mostly because it’s all markdown in the backend, and markdown is great to edit, for the most part ðŸ™ƒ. Since messaging people my thoughts is highly inefficient and wastes their time, more likely than not, i’m gonna write to my self on this nifty blog.
